sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CRTBCMAC( CMAC_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), CMAC_PART_NO VARCHAR(20), CMAC_EONO VARCHAR(20), CMAC_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0), CMAC_COME_CODE CHAR(4), CMAC_CUMT_GUBN CHAR(1), CMAC_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(10, 0), CMAC_DESC_01 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_02 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_03 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_04 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_05 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_06 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_07 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_08 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_09 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_10 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_11 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_12 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_13 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_14 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_15 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_16 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_17 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_18 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_19 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_DESC_20 VARCHAR(500), CMAC_COEF_01 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_02 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_03 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_04 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_05 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_06 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_07 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_08 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_09 NUMBER(14, 6), CMAC_COEF_10 NUMBER(14, 6), CONSTRAINT CRTBCMAC_PK PRIMARY KEY ( CMAC_CORP_CODE, CMAC_PART_NO, CMAC_EONO, CMAC_CUMT_NO, CMAC_COME_CODE, CMAC_CUMT_GUBN, CMAC_MATL_SEQ0 ) )
